# CNInstantMessageAddress

**Class**

An immutable object representing an instant message address for the contact.

## Declaration

```swift
class CNInstantMessageAddress
```

## Overview

Use the methods and properties of `CNInstantMessageAddress` to identify instant messaging addresses. Some instant message services, such as Facebook and Skype are predefined in this class. You can also specify your own instant message service using the [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNInstantMessageAddress/init(username:service:)] method.

`CNInstantMessageAddress` objects are thread-safe, and you may access their properties from any thread of your app.

## Creating an Instant Message Address

- **init(username:service:)**: Returns a [doc://com.apple.contacts/documentation/Contacts/CNInstantMessageAddress] object initialized with the specified user name and service.

## Getting the Address Information

- **service**: The name of the instant message address service.
- **username**: The user name for instant message service address.

## Getting Localized Address Information

- **localizedString(forKey:)**: Returns a string containing the localized property name.
- **CNInstantMessageAddressUsernameKey**: Instant message address username key.
- **CNInstantMessageAddressServiceKey**: Instant message address service key.

## Getting Localized Service Names

- **localizedString(forService:)**: Returns a string containing the localized name of the specified service.
- **CNInstantMessageServiceAIM**: Instant message service for AIM.
- **CNInstantMessageServiceFacebook**: Instant message service for Facebook.
- **CNInstantMessageServiceGaduGadu**: Instant message service for Gadu Gadu.
- **CNInstantMessageServiceGoogleTalk**: Instant message service for Google Talk.
- **CNInstantMessageServiceICQ**: Instant message service for ICQ.
- **CNInstantMessageServiceJabber**: Instant message service for Jabber.
- **CNInstantMessageServiceMSN**: Instant message service for MSN.
- **CNInstantMessageServiceQQ**: Instant message service for QQ.
- **CNInstantMessageServiceSkype**: Instant message service for Skype.
- **CNInstantMessageServiceYahoo**: Instant message service for Yahoo.

## Addresses

- **CNPostalAddress**: An immutable representation of the postal address for a contact.
- **CNMutablePostalAddress**: A mutable representation of the postal address for a contact.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
